commits.msg: moved nova all test to manifest.

Added vagrant testing specific files.

- Vagrantfile
- added vagrant deploy host specfics
Added stuff related to my testing of multi-node
Added my additional test manifests

added glance params back

for backwards compat with stable nova version.
updated submodules and site.pp
updating my vagrant file, manifests and scripts
updated image service.

(#9874) Add openstack diablo ppa

Adds class openstack::repo::diablo which sets up
the ppa to install openstack diablo.

Also added to the host setup manifest.

update modules

add vcsrepo

Update .gitmodules

remove openstack diablo repo class

Total rewrite of the openstack project

Converts the entire project from submodules to
a single module with a rake task to manage its dependencies.

This has been done b/c there needs to be a module called openstack
to contain all of the higher level openstack specifications.
Remove avaiable_ips from nova-vm-net now that we have CIDR
Fi controller.pp for cidr

Ensure vncproxy is enabled.

Currently, the service is not ensures to be running for the all
in one installation.

This commit resolves the issue.

Add openstack::auth_file class

This commit adds a class called openstack::auth_file
that creates the file openrc with admin credentials
that can be used to authenticate.

Update bindhost to 0.0.0.0

The bindhost for keystone in the nova::controller
was accidentally set to 127.0.0.1.

This did not allow for remote connections for multi-host
compute nodes.

This commit updates keystone to use 0.0.0.0

Ensure that verbose can be set for nova

Previously, this config param was not exposed in all
of the openstack interfaces.

Ensure that libvirt type can be overridden

This commit ensures that libvirt type can be
overridden for all of the openstack classes.

Refactor network code

This commit completely refactors all of the network
related code.

- adds the ability to configure multi-host networks.
- removes explicitly created bridge
- refactors code to work with nova network refactor.

Fix typo

Param was called $export_resource, but when used it was expected to be
named $export_resources.

Remove network_host parameter

network_host has been removed upstream a while ago. It's no longer
needed at all.

Use rabbit_host parameter

openstack::compute takes a rabbit_host parameter, but it's not getting
passed to class[nova].

Revert "Use rabbit_host parameter"

This reverts commit 3e419bc834751bc2625a7ff2df2d986a62dcb363.

This commit actually added a duplicate parameters that caused
duplicate resource definitions.

Add LICENSE and inline documentation.

This commit adds an apache license and inline documentation for the
manifest.

Change verbose default to false

This commit changes the default of verbose to false
for openstack::all.

Ensure that verbose is set for nova class

Previously, the verbose option was not being passed
to the nova class.

This commit resolves the issue.

Add nova::volume:iscsi class to nova::all

This class adds nova::volume::iscsi to the nova::all
class. This ensures that volumes can be managed

Change fixed_range default to /24

Having the default set to /16 was causing issues
on some versions of openstack that complained this
range was too big.

This commit decreases the size of the network being
created.

Add volume management option for compute nodes

This commit adds an option that can be used to
enable volume management on compute nodes.

It also adds a parameter that can be used to determine the name
of the volume group where volumes should be allocated from.

Allow nova volume vg name to be overridden in openstack::all

Adds a class parameter that can be used to override the name of
the volume group used by nova-volumes.

Write spec test for openstack::compute

* Include the puppetlabs_spec_helper gem for autogeneration of the fixtures dir

Change admin_user_password to admin_password

This change is for consistency b/c this same class parameter is
called admin_passeword in the nova::controller class.

Add inline documentation.

To document all of the classes parameters.

update examples/site.pp

This commit updates the examples site.pp in preparation for release.

- explicitly sets more variables to provide a better example for the user
- uses the openstack::auth_file class

Update service user param names

This commit changes the names of the service user password
to *_user_password.

This change has been made to make the controller interface more
consistent with the all interface.

Improvements to example site.pp

This commit contains some improvements to the example site.pp
that were made in preparation for release.

- sets verbose, fixed_range and rabbit user/password in all in one example
- refactos controller

Fix syntax errors

This commit removes a couple of extraneous command introduced by
copy/past errors.

Clean up openstack::compute example manifest

Implements a good compute example in the example manifest

Style update

Aligns equal signs
updated nova_test.sh to include floating IP and security_groups, and controller.pp to support a change in the horizon module (more horizon services)
updates based on pull request
reversed nova_test.sh updates, fixed misspelling in controller.pp; added parameters needed to enable additional horizon services
Typo fixed_network_range
Add missing  for openstack_compute.
compute.pp's admin_password should sync with $nova_user_password of controller.pp.
Add missing send_arp_for_ha for multi_host mode, reference from devstack.
Add optional auto_assign_floating_ip parameter.
Also disable send_arp_for_ha when multi_host is false.

Add enabled parameter to nova::controller

This commit add the config param enabled to the nova::controller class.

This parameter is used to determine if the installation of the controller
node should be an active or passive installation for active-passive clustering.

Add template to create test file

This commit creates a template to manage the nova test file.
It was converted to a template to make it more configurable.
It deletes the old static file.
Fix rabbitmq connection when not exporting resources
$auto_assign_floating_ip needs to be a boolean and not string
$verbose should not be quoted
Enable floating IP on all-in-one setup

Make public urls use public_address in all-in-one

The public url endpoints currently use 127.0.0.1 for their hostname, so
it's impossible to use the all-in-one cloud from outside the host.
Change this to public_address so that it can be tested from the outside.
(#15205) Enable multihost by default in the example
Add the secret_key parameter to the Horizon class
vnc_enabled should be a literal boolean value

Update keystone bind_host value to 0.0.0.0

Currently this is configured as 127.0.0.1 which disallows
Identity Service API calls from remote hosts. Updated to
0.0.0.0 so as to allow remote connections but not break
any 127.0.0.1 requests. This is actually the default value
but rather then undef the param I am just changing it.

Keystone admin tenant and mysql root password

Added ability to set the keystone admin tenant and the mysql root password.
Added swift manifests

Beginning cleanup/refactor of puppetlabs-openstack.

Started to create individual manifests for core openstack components such as
Glance, keystone, nova, and horizon. Began to incorporate those
manifests into main manifests. Wrote some tests. Fixed some typos.
Began putting params in individual manifests instead of a single params.pp file.

temporary commit.

This commit contains changes and notes related to the initial
code review between joe topjian and myself.

It is not intended to be merged, but it part of an ongoing
collaboration for a refactor of this module.
Further edits.
Further edits

Fix bug in variable naming

This commit fixes a bug in the naming of a variable.

was

  enable_network-service

has been update to

  enable_network_service

Remove collection code from openstack::nova::compute

This commit removes the collection code from
openstack::nova::compute.

Having this class collect all nova_config entries
seems incorrect (and dangerous). I prefer requiring
users to pass in all of their connection data.

Pass enabled flag to nova::vncproxy

This commit passes the openstack::nova::controller
parameter enabled to nova::vncproxy to allow
nova controller to be built where this service is
installed but not currently enabled.

This is intended to support active-passive HA.

Always create nova class

This commit removes the defined statement that was
used for conditionally creating the nova class
in openstack::nova::compute.

This usage of ! defined introduced ordering issues
that would make it extremely difficult to understand
how nova would be configured.

unset default for public_interface

This commit unsets the public_interface default.

This is to make the code behave more like the
previous iteration.

Always configure network

This network class is used to configure both
nodes hosting the network service as well
as compute nodes that are utilizing an external
network service.

This commit ensures that this class is always created.

Support enabled for keystone

This commit adds support for keystone servers
running in passive mode.
Add configuration for cache_server setting in horizon.

Support passive mysql servers

Adds code to support passive mysql instances.

Add openstack::compute

This commit adds openstack::compute for backwards
compatibility.

change exported_resources param to export_resources


for backwards compatibility

Add conditional dependency

Add a conditional dependency that glance::registry
should be configured only after its database is
created.

This code only needs to be created on active nodes.

Refactor parameter defaults

Add more parameter defaults to support backwards
compatibility.

Update class parameter documentation

This commit adds relevant class parameters to all
classes.

Update default for keystone admin_address

This updates the default for the keystone admin
address to use internal_address.

This is a more reasonable default than using the
public_address.

Remove auth_file

This commit removes the auth_file from the controller
and all classes.

For backwards compatibility.

Remove unused public controller node.

This commit removes the unused parameter
controller node.

Set defaults in openstack::all class

This commit specifies defaults for the openstack::all
class.

change public_address back to controller_node

To avoid breaking backwards compatibility.

shorten names of keystone db class params

removed the extra keystone_ prefix.

remove openstack::nova::compute

it is the same as openstack::compute

add keystone_host to the controller

for the case where they are not installed on the
same machine.

remove some class param default chains

It is not clear if puppet supports the ability to
use class param values as the defaults for other
class params.

I am refactoring my code to assume this does not work.
total refactor of openstack::compute

Add cinder support

remove volume management from openstack::compute
add cinder server services to openstack::controller
add cinder db code
class params cannot be dep on other class params
replaced nova::nework with quantum.
set root_password
update test file to work with quantum
Removed unused network configs

Change log_verbose and log_debug to verbose and debug

to make it compatible with the concurrent changes to keystone.
update log_debug,log_verbose to debug,verbose
update params
nova-network work. cinder and quantum logic
removed trailing whitespace.

Add support for setting regions.

This commit adds a region parameter which can be
used to set the region used for all keystone
endpoints.

re-add nova-network support

This commit adds nova network support for
openstack::compute, openstack::controller, and
openstack::nova::controller.

Add cinder config to nova::compute

embed logic for managing cinder in openstack::compute.

stop exporting resources.

This commit removes embedded logic that was
exporting resources. Service discovery should be
performed from the site manifest using query
against puppet db.
Add live migration support
style updates
add vnc_enabled flag
reorganize class params for controller

refactor all.pp

Massive refactor for all in one installation
for folsom.

remove unused compute params

The params public and admin address were not used
by the openstack::compute class so I removed them.

remove defaults for controller passwords

Setting default password for everything is setting
people up for accidentally insecure openstack
environments.

do not use other class param values as default

This commit removes examples where class params
used the values of other params as their default.
I recently learned that this does not work!

update cinder def in compute

It was out of date with the latest version of the
modules.

update other repos for folsom

- update other_repos.yaml
- include apache for all in one

remove ref to invalid variable

replace refs to internal address with 127.0.0.1
style updates

change controller params

- make cinder the default
- reorganize params
- have fewer default passwords

fix vncproxy_host

in all.pp it was set to localhost, which broke
horizon's ability to use vnc.

fix minor compute issues

This commit resolves a few minor issues uncovered
when fixing the spec tests.

fail explicitly for unsupported db types

in all.pp

remove trailing comma

to fix 2.6.x support

Add quantum to compute, all and controller

These commits add management of quantum to the
openstack compute, controller and all classes.

Fix typo

missing '{' was breaking quantum.

quantum updates

- do not make quantum the default config
- update params to reflect latest quantum module
Add rabbit_virtual_host support to openstack controller module .. feature exists in puppetlabs-nova already. Also Made installation of Horizon optional.
Add rabbit_virtual_host support to openstack controller module .. feature exists in puppetlabs-nova already. Also Made installation of Horizon optional.
